title: Video: Unbelievably rich, labor-intensive lettering and how it's made
content:
Have you ever been struck by John Mayer's "Born and Raised" cover art? Here's the [making-of video](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013113122/http:/vimeo.com/60647216). The artist shows off all kinds of techniques, like reverse glass etching.

See a [giant, high-res image](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013113122/http:/illmaterial.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/John_Mayer_-_Born_and_Raised_cover.jpg) of the cover, 9x larger than this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013113122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/john-mayer-born-and-raised%5B1%5D_6580.jpg)
author: pdxuser
